images.description: A hot air balloon flies over a verdant landscape dotted with ancient temples at sunrise.

images.description: A colony of seals lounges on rocky terrain near the water's edge.

images.description: A group of humpback whales is breaching with their mouths open in the ocean, with a seagull flying overhead.

images.description: A woman in a yellow tank top and black shorts is exercising on a gym machine, with other gym equipment and patrons in the background.

images.description: A variety of fresh fruits, vegetables, and nuts are arranged on a wooden surface. There's a basket of apples, a watermelon slice, and grains.

images.description: A diver explores a sunken shipwreck near a coral reef underwater, the diver has a pair of swimming flippers on and is wearing an oxygen tank. The image is shown to be underwater.
